place_description: Full service coffee and tea bar also serving healthy, vegan forward breakfast and lunch options.

reviews_data.review_text:
I love the atmosphere at Optimist Hall.
Undercurrent has a great atmosphere and decorations as well.
The employees were very friendly and helpful!
The coffee was pretty solid (I got my usual latte), the sausage breakfast sandwich I got fell short of my expectations, and the breakfast burrito was overtly salty.
I'll definitely come back and try some pastries and some other breakfast items though.
Quite a good shop to check out!
Pretty good matcha & service!

Start off your Optimist Hall visit with a stop at Undercurrent Coffee and get yourself a cold brew. Their beans have the best flavor and the coffee is so rich and smooth. Plus it's a great place to hangout and enjoy the vibes, both inside and outside.
Staff was very friendly.
Had an ice cold brew of black coffee goodness! Absolutely the best, and the service staff was on point!
Best matcha latte I've ever had.
Stopped by about 30 minutes ago, pretty much right when they opened. Got the seasonal Kentucky latte, and as I'm walking to work, this is hitting the spot!

This place had the single worst cup of coffee I've ever purchased. I went back to see if the iced was better than the drip coffee, and I ended up tossing the iced coffee, which says a lot.
HOWEVER!! The staff were really polite, answered all my questions and were super knowledgeable. They were polite, friendly, and very kind. The atmosphere was fairly awesome. The place looks and SMELLS amazing. But the coffee was extremely lacking, even though the prices were beyond reasonable and the staff were great. A friend compared the taste to Maxwell House, but having never had Maxwell House, I cannot confirm. I can just confirm they tried my cup of drip coffee. They're also using eco-plastics (from recycled plant matter?) for the utensils and straws, which is awesome.
But, for a coffee shop... the coffee was awful.

The entire staff was very attentive and took care of customers in a timely manner. The manager was the best, she has trained her team very well. I look forward to returning again when I come back to Charlotte.
I tried cappuccino over there and it was delicious. Thank you guys!
Good specialty coffee shop inside a large food court.
Nice espresso drinks - nice single origin caf and decaf beans. Smooth, medium, almost light-to-medium roasted.

I hesitantly tried their coffee (I'm diehard for Sbux frappes, and I dislike the taste of coffee), and it is SO GOOD
I like it as much as the frappes I get from sbux.
The staff are super friendly and go out of their way to make sure everyone's visit is pleasant.

It's definitely my new go-to coffee shop. Ask for a mocha latte with caramel. You won't regret it
Great coffee!
I don't know what it is, but the coffee is so amazing. Honestly my favorite out of all coffee shops.  I got the iced vanilla latte

They coffee it is really bad, for a lover of coffee or expresso, it is the worst coffee I've ever had, they don't take any cash only card, and they took so long to make a simple expresso, bad experience.
Smachna kava , rekomenduiu

Ordered an iced latte and got some kind of pre-made coffee concentrate mixed with milk. It tasted alright, but $7 is a lot to not get a fresh shot of espresso for a latte. It would be one thing if they were busy, but I was the only one in line.

One of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte. Depending who is working on the bar, sometimes I have had killer shots! I love the varieties of tea as well, as Spirit does an amazing job at sourcing quality teas from around the world. Bagels and avocado toast are also amazing!
When I was at undercurrent in optimist hall today, there was a huge line. I wasn't even going to attempt to order. Optimist in general was a bit crazy, so I could only imagine.
This is still one of my favorite spots, but I will only come when it's chill.
Amazing brand design and nicely brewed matcha! A little pricey however, and few sweetener/flavor options.
Delicious coffee
a great coffee place!
Great drinks here
Muy decepcionado. Mas de 4$ por algunos milimetros de cafe mal preparado

Pleasant people,
and decent drinks

Very good coffee, this was the first coffee place I have gone where the person taking your order takes the time to explain the sizes so that you get the right size coffee and avoid assumption about the size of the cup.  Good communication. Much appreciated.
Just had coffee but it was really good brew , took a little time though , I guess they were just getting in the working mode.
They were so rude for no reason! I was asking questions about what I wanted to order. Matcha wasn't taste. I will never return here.... Please learn customer service

Don't know why you serve espresso shots in paper cups. Made sense in 2020 but pretty sad to do that to your product now.

Edit: I had a 3 star experience at the shop but the owner made this a 5 star experience overall. I looked forward to coming to Charlotte again to try Undercurrent again.
Good place for morning coffee and they also have great tea as well.
Could have been hotter, but good. Next time I would opt for the 12 ounce.
Really, really slow. If you gotta be somewhere think twice about getting your coffee here.
I really like this place. Very good coffee. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is bc it's overpriced - but so is every other place in Optimist Hall.
Matcha affogato
The people of Undercurrent Coffee are just awesome! My husband is a big fan! He also loves their Plaza Midwood location. This spot in Optimist Hall is a must! Great service with a smile!
Their coffee is perfectly made. The brown sugar vanilla latte is my go to order.

I'm really particular about coffee but my single origin espresso and drip coffee were pretty stellar. A lot of clarity in the shot and the drip coffee.

The barista was super knowledgeable and friendly when there wasn't a line, and very efficient when there was. Great service.

Fair warning, the pour overs on their website aren't available at this location. They have one all day drip roast and then a second roast until 1 pm. No complaints about the quality of the drip coffee; it was excellent. Espressos are served with sparkling water and a demitasse spoon!

Tl;dr -- Great specialty coffee shop for drip coffee and espresso. Five star shot.
Fantastic coffee with interesting seasonal flavors. The Cinnamon Bun latte is delicious. Always love grabbing something here after eating at one of the many great food vendors.
Delicious coffee and love the decor! Love Optimist Hall that you can grab a cup of coffee and sit inside or outside for great conversation!

So glad undercurrent is at optimist hall as it's the only vender open and serving prior to 10/11. Got a few drinks (cold brew with oat milk, dirty chia with oat milk, golden milk latte) and each were good. Service was quick.
I ordered Ice Vanila Latte with half of almond & oat milk. The taste reminds me Not Just Coffee Shop. Anyway it was pretty good :)

Very cool place. Located inside a refurbished older large building that now consists of food stands, restaurants, and shops called Optimist Park.  Barista was so sweet and awesome. I got a brown sugar vanilla cappuccino.  I'm a former barista and can say she made the drink PERFECT.  Was so yummy! Not overly sweet, perfect foam and even had latte art on top. My only con here was the lack of size options. There wasn't one for this drink. The cup was maybe 10oz? I also went back, as I had been sitting outside, to get another 10 mins before closing. There was someone washing dishes you could see in the back, but no one helped me and the register area looked shut down. Other than that, loved my experience and will be back.
Coffee is good but come after 7:30p and your coffee will take 20 minutes
Coffee and tea suggestions were delicious and Espresso with ice cream is where it's at! Thank you Kevin for all your help and tea knowledge and top notch service
Excellent coffee, friendly service. Will definitely be back.

Really enjoyed my experience here. I had a few hours to kill before my flight and a food hall (with a coffee shop) seemed like the best option. Service was attentive (thanks, Kevin!) and there was lots of seating, too.
Perfect Cappuccinos
Fantastic

Say yes to a cherry on top for the Black Forest Latte! 
Enjoying the seasonal menu
Friendly and helpful baristas! The brown sugar vanilla iced latte as well as the caramel iced latte were spectacular

Ordered an iced latte (espresso and milk) and saw the batista pouring coffee from a pitcher. She explained that they make iced lattes with coldbrew because it's faster and they did a blind taste test and there's no difference. 

there is most certainly a difference between the quality and taste and caffine of a drink with 2 oz of espresso vs 2 oz of coldbrew. The entire prep is different. She was very kind and said they could make it with espresso if otherwise requested. Got my espresso it is good. But for an $8 12oz latte, it is an absolute sham to serve these with coldbrew.
Pretty good coffee - similar to Queen City Grounds. They don't have much else there and they were missing on a tea for my friend. Nice service - strong 4 aspiring to a 5.

The staff at Undercurrent is wonderful. Optimist Hall is a good vibe is you want a bustling and fun spot to grab coffee on the weekend. For weekdays, I like the original location in Plaza Midwood. Erica and her team deliver perfection every time.
Amazing experience awesome baristas

Great service! My BF and I came kinda close to closing time and even though they were obviously tired and close to done for the day, they were very friendly and helpful with taking our order and helping us choose.
The cappuccino here was delightful:)
Don't go here for food.

The barista was very disinterested in making my order for some reason. She was washing dishes and did not even properly wash her hands before making me coffee. Ordered a hot chocolate and a cappuccino and guess what, the taste was pretty bad. Won't recommend.
Amazing folks work here. The coffee is delicious. The seasonals are creative. I have nothing but a shower of compliments.

A beautiful little coffee shop nestled within Optimist Hall. Is staffed by friendly, knowledgeable, and caring people, who make outstanding espresso drinks and tea. Stop by for the coffee, stay for the atmosphere.
Delicious coffee and a wonderful place to sit and enjoy!

Coffee is usually good, but today it was not how it usually taste. I don't know if the girl missed a step but it was very strong and bitter. I usually ask for regular coffee made with oat milk a ounce of caramel and a ounce of vanilla. I know next time not to have her make it. Customer service is good.
I've spent a few mornings working in optimist halls and I love going to this place. The brown sugar latte is so good, definitely try it!
Very tasty coffee. Latte was good.
Really good coffee! You won't be disappointed.

This place is serious about good coffee. If you're looking for a great cup of coffee Undercurrent has to be one of the top places in Charlotte to get that oh-so-sweet magic in a cup. I've been to both locations in Optimist Hall and Plaza Midwood and both experiences were great.

Highly recommended!
Average at best. Nothing fancy, nothing special. I expected more.
Really hit or miss depending on the staff that is working. Some days amazing service some days decent
I got the hot chocolate and it was the best I've had in a long time.
Was going to order coffee from these guys but they serve people that do not Wear masks even though their sign says "no mask no service" Way to be socially irresponsible!!
I was a bit disappointed because the espresso was under extracted and the $12 breakfast sandwich (added avocado and bacon) was the size of a slider.

First time and they nailed a Latte perfectly... also, they were extremely friendly ... even wearing masks they had joy in their voices and I greatly appreciate that. Thanks for a great hot latte (with almond milk) and your fantastic positive attitude! I'll be back :)
This place is absolutely wonderful. The coffee is smooth and delicious.
Very friendly staff. Unique tasting coffee and breakfast items.

Got a latte and the avocado toast - both were DELICIOUS, very comparably priced for the quality/type of fare, and I LOVED the Optimist Hall seating venue/options! Also, the gentleman who took my order might just have been the most positive, pleasant, genuine feeling barista I've ever interacted with :) I visited from out of town, and I'm already looking forward to going back next time I'm in the area!!
nice coffee but more because of the place

Service, atmosphere, food, and most importantly coffee are GREAT here. The workers are really nice and answered our questions"there were a lot"
I have been there three times and I will definitely go back.
Try the Black Forest Coffee drink
Love the cappuccino here on rainy Charlotte afternoon. Definitely coming back for more
Great coffee, no frills, simple setup here... Get your coffee and move along
Very good
Incredible lattes and cappuccinos from really nice people. Expect to wait a minute or two because they put a lot of care into each drink. (Visited March 2020)

Order: Drip Coffee, Cappuccino
Price: $8
Positives: Good cappuccino, awesome space, can't want to see once it's all open
Negatives: No pour over, a tad weak
tldr: I'm super excited for this space in general. I love the whole "market" feel and I really think Undercurrent is going to bring a lot to the space. I will say that all the coffee had good flavor but tasted just a little weak for my preferences.

Thoughts: Even though we were only in Charlotte for a few days we went to a few different cafes. This is sort of a thing for us, we will often go to several coffee shops a day for up to five days before finally settling on our "regular". We are aware we have a problem. Anyway something that I was beginning to notice is that very few places do poor overs. They just have a drip coffee and then espresso drinks. That's super weird and jarring for me because most coffee places I like have pour overs, and it's both one of my favorite ways to have my coffee made, and one of the most consistent ways to see if a coffee shop has high quality beans and a good brewing process. So the fact that none of these coffee shops could do a pour over kind of threw me.

Regardless, we got a drip coffee instead, and a cappuccino. Both of them were actually very good. I was honestly surprised at how good the drip coffee, was which is a testament to the quality of their coffee beans. Normally I don't like drip coffee because it sits in an insulated container and gets so hot that it taste burnt. In this case it didn't taste burnt at all, it still had depth and complexity of flavor. The cappuccino was very flavorful and rich. That being said, I do think that both of the drinks were on the weaker side for my taste but not as extreme as some other places I've been.

Undercurrent also has a unique scenario going on because they are in a market. The entire place is super cool and when it's done, seems to be ready to be filled with places to hang out, a few small unique shops, and a bunch of restaurants. Right now it definitely isn't finished (it being the market, Undercurrent is 100% up and running) and there's only a handful of restaurants open but I can't wait to see this place when it's finished. I will definitely make a point to come back if I'm ever headed through Charlotte. For this current trip we just hung out for about 20 minutes and spent some time looking around and drinking our coffee, but I could definitely see people hanging out here for extended periods of time.

All in all I think Undercurrent is a pretty solid place to go get your coffee especially if you also need food or want to hang out with anyone. Like I said, the flavor was definitely there but for people who like really strong coffee this might not make the cut, or you may need to ask him to put more espresso in the drinks. But I know that my wife and I will be back in the future.
That cappuccino is what will bring me back there. Such a nice spot and great coffee.
Great cappuccino (please make the soda fizzier and then it'll be perfect)
Incredible coffee and environment.
